mapper.sql:
a.id AS "id", a.check_price_cutoff_date AS "checkPriceCutoffDate", a.check_price_insert_date AS "checkPriceInsertDate", a.check_code AS "sicmedTwxrayCheck.id", a.check_price AS "checkPrice", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag",
b.check_name AS "sicmedTwxrayCheck.checkName"
LEFT JOIN sicmed_twxray_check b ON b.id = a.check_code
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sicmed_check_price( id, check_price_cutoff_date, check_price_insert_date, check_code, check_price, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{checkPriceCutoffDate}, #{checkPriceInsertDate}, #{sicmedTwxrayCheck.id}, #{checkPrice}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sicmed_check_price SET check_price_cutoff_date = #{checkPriceCutoffDate}, check_price_insert_date = #{checkPriceInsertDate}, check_code = #{sicmedTwxrayCheck.id}, check_price = #{checkPrice}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, del_flag = #{delFlag}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
